title: Cookie Settings
description: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience and analyze our website. With your consent, we can collect anonymous usage statistics to improve our services.
essentialDesc: These cookies are required for the basic functions of the website and cannot be disabled.
analyticsDesc: Google Analytics helps us understand how visitors use our website. All data is stored anonymously and is GDPR compliant.
